name.description: Full legal name of the client. This field is mandatory.

address.description: Complete street address of the client, including city, state, and ZIP code.

phone.description: Primary contact phone number for the client. Should include area code.

email.description: Primary email address of the client. Must be a valid email format.

dateOfBirth.description: Client's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format.

careNeeds.description: List of specific care needs or services required by the client (e.g., 'medication reminder', 'meal preparation', 'mobility assistance').

isActive.description: Indicates if the client's profile is currently active and they are receiving services. Defaults to true.

additionalNotes.description: Any other relevant information or specific preferences for the client.

emergencyContactName.description: Name of the client's primary emergency contact.

emergencyContactPhone.description: Phone number of the client's primary emergency contact.
